languages.text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on the {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g} area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на тыл также делает союзников в этой зоне наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетными целями{/g} для противников на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Affecting the Rear area with a stratagem also makes the allies in that area the least priority targets for enemies for 1 round.
Using a stratagem on a Rear area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest priority targets for 1 round.

Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Rear area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Rear area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Использование стратагемы на тыл также делает союзников в этой зоне наименее приоритетными целями для противников на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: 对{g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}后方{/g}区域使用{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}时，可以让该区域内的所有盟友被敌人攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先度{/g}降至最低，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on the {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g} area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对后方区域使用战略能力时，可以让该区域内的所有盟友被敌人攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先度{/g}降至最低，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Utilizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} en la {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}retaguardia{/g} también convierte a los aliados presentes en esa zona en los {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivos prioritarios{/g} de menor preferencia durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on the {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g} area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Utilizar una estratagema en la retaguardia también convierte a los aliados presentes en esa zona en los {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivos prioritarios{/g} de menor preferencia durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Die Anwendung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategems{/g} auf ein {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Nachhut{/g}-Gebiet macht die dortigen Verbündeten auch zu den unwichtigsten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätszielen{/g} der Feinde, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on the {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g} area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Anwendung eines Strategems auf ein Nachhut-Gebiet macht die dortigen Verbündeten auch zu den unwichtigsten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätszielen{/g} der Feinde, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: L'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g} dans une {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Zone arrière{/g} transforme également les alliés présents dans cette zone en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cibles les moins prioritaires{/g} de l'ennemi pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on the {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g} area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation d'un Stratagème dans une Zone arrière transforme également les alliés présents dans cette zone en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cibles les moins prioritaires{/g} de l'ennemi pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 後衛エリアに{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、そのエリア内の味方の敵からの{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}の優先度が最低になる。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Rear area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 後衛エリアに{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、そのエリア内の味方の敵からの{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}の優先度が最低になる。

languages.text: {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Geri hatta{/g} alanında bir {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kullanmak, o alandaki dost birimleri düşmanların en düşük {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefleri{/g} hâline getirir. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on the {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g} area also makes the allies in that area the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority targets{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Art Cephe alanında bir {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kullanmak, o alandaki dost birimleri düşmanların en düşük {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefleri{/g} hâline getirir. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
